title: SET_BLIP_FLASH_INTERVAL
content:
0xAA51DB313C010A7E0xEAF67377// SetBlipFlashInterval
void SET_BLIP_FLASH_INTERVAL(Blip blip, int interval);Parameters:blip: The blip to change flashing intervalinterval: Interval in milliseconds before flashing the blipSets the interval in milliseconds before flashing the blip.Examples:LuaJavaScriptlocal blip = AddBlipForCoord(0, 0, 0)

SetBlipFlashes(blip, true)

-- flash the blip every 50ms
SetBlipFlashInterval(blip, 50)
codeBlocks:
// SetBlipFlashInterval
void SET_BLIP_FLASH_INTERVAL(Blip blip, int interval);

local blip = AddBlipForCoord(0, 0, 0)

SetBlipFlashes(blip, true)

-- flash the blip every 50ms
SetBlipFlashInterval(blip, 50)
